title: bhAvayEham
sahitya:
bhAvayEham raghuvIram shrIkaram sEvakAryi haraNa caturam karuNAkaram


anupallavi

  jIvanEtAram jAnakI manOharam rAvaNAdyariharam ratipati sundaram


caraNam    vAnarAdhipati kula samjAtam bhAsamAna maNihAra shObhitam 
bhUsuraukArcitam vAsavAdi sannutam vAsudEvam haram vAtAtmajAvana radam
